May 2, 1976 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A) 10 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-a
March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Civic Hall, Holmfirth March contest - Hade Edge. Best cornet - Fred Shepley (Boarshurst) Best Basses - Skelmanthorpe. Best hymn tune - Boarshurst. 4 bands competed.
April 4, 2012, 8:44 p.m. Sept. 14, 2017, 11 a.m.

2 Hade Edge Jack Fisher
